languages.text: При смерти владельца лопаются кровяные наросты обрызгивая всех вражеских юнитов в радиусе 1 клетки. Попадая на врагов вызывает Неутолимый зуд (indomitable itch) на 3 раунда

traits.locale_text: При смерти владельца лопаются кровяные наросты обрызгивая всех вражеских юнитов в радиусе 1 клетки. Попадая на врагов вызывает Неутолимый зуд (indomitable itch) на 3 раунда

languages.text: When this creature dies, its blisters pop, splattering blood on adjacent enemies. The affected enemies suffer +1 stack of {g|f:3bfd44baa24c4533b370dd1373a50e46}Unbearable Itch{/g}. This effect stacks up to 3 times and lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда это существо погибает, его волдыри взрываются, забрызгивая кровью врагов на соседних клетках. Они получают +1 уровень эффекта {g|f:3bfd44baa24c4533b370dd1373a50e46}нестерпимый зуд{/g}. Суммируется до 3 раз и длится 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

traits.locale_text: When this creature dies, its blisters pop splattering blood on adjacent enemies. The affected enemies suffer +1 stack of {g|f:3bfd44baa24c4533b370dd1373a50e46}Indomitable Itch{/g}. This effect stacks up to 3 times and lasts for 3 rounds.

When this creature dies, its blisters pop, splattering blood on adjacent enemies. The affected enemies suffer +1 stack of {g|f:3bfd44baa24c4533b370dd1373a50e46}Unbearable Itch{/g}. This effect stacks up to 3 times and lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

When this creature dies, its blisters pop, splattering blood on adjacent enemies. The affected enemies suffer +1 stack of {g|f:3bfd44baa24c4533b370dd1373a50e46}Unbearable Itch{/g}. This effect stacks up to 3 times and lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.text: Bu yaratık öldüğünde kabarcıkları patlayarak bitişikteki düşmanların üzerine kan fışkırtır. Etkilenen düşmanlar, +1 {g|f:3bfd44baa24c4533b370dd1373a50e46}Dayanılmaz Kaşıntı{/g} birikimine maruz kalır. Bu etki, 3 kez üst üste birikebilir ve 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
languages.original_text: When this creature dies, its blisters pop, splattering blood on adjacent enemies. The affected enemies suffer +1 stack of {g|f:3bfd44baa24c4533b370dd1373a50e46}Unbearable Itch{/g}. This effect stacks up to 3 times and lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bu yaratık öldüğünde kabarcıkları patlayarak bitişikteki düşmanların üzerine kan fışkırtır. Etkilenen düşmanlar, +1 {g|f:3bfd44baa24c4533b370dd1373a50e46}Dayanılmaz Kaşıntı{/g} birikimine maruz kalır. Bu etki, 3 kez üst üste birikebilir ve 3 raunt sürer.

Bu yaratık öldüğünde kabarcıkları patlayarak bitişikteki düşmanların üzerine kan fışkırtır. Etkilenen düşmanlar, +1 {g|f:3bfd44baa24c4533b370dd1373a50e46}Dayanılmaz Kaşıntı{/g} birikimine maruz kalır. Bu etki, 3 kez üst üste birikebilir ve 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.

languages.text: Cuando esta criatura muere, sus forúnculos estallan y rocían de sangre a los enemigos adyacentes. Los enemigos afectados sufren +1 acumulación de {g|f:3bfd44baa24c4533b370dd1373a50e46}Picor insoportable{/g}. Este efecto se acumula hasta 3 veces y dura 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.
languages.original_text: When this creature dies, its blisters pop, splattering blood on adjacent enemies. The affected enemies suffer +1 stack of {g|f:3bfd44baa24c4533b370dd1373a50e46}Unbearable Itch{/g}. This effect stacks up to 3 times and lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando esta criatura muere, sus forúnculos estallan y rocían de sangre a los enemigos adyacentes. Los enemigos afectados sufren +1 acumulación de {g|f:3bfd44baa24c4533b370dd1373a50e46}Picor insoportable{/g}. Este efecto se acumula hasta 3 veces y dura 3 asaltos.

languages.text: 此生物死亡时，它身上的脓疱会爆开，将鲜血泼溅到邻近敌人身上。受影响的敌人会获得1层{g|f:3bfd44baa24c4533b370dd1373a50e46}奇痒难耐{/g}效果。此效果最多可叠加3次，持续三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: When this creature dies, its blisters pop, splattering blood on adjacent enemies. The affected enemies suffer +1 stack of {g|f:3bfd44baa24c4533b370dd1373a50e46}Unbearable Itch{/g}. This effect stacks up to 3 times and lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此生物死亡时，它身上的脓疱会爆开，将鲜血泼溅到邻近敌人身上。受影响的敌人会获得1层{g|f:3bfd44baa24c4533b370dd1373a50e46}奇痒难耐{/g}效果。此效果最多可叠加3次，持续三轮。

languages.text: Quand la créature meurt, ses cloques éclatent en aspergeant de sang les ennemis proches, qui reçoivent +1 cumul de {g|f:3bfd44baa24c4533b370dd1373a50e46}Démangeaison insupportable{/g}. Cet effet est cumulable 3 fois et persiste pendant 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: When this creature dies, its blisters pop, splattering blood on adjacent enemies. The affected enemies suffer +1 stack of {g|f:3bfd44baa24c4533b370dd1373a50e46}Unbearable Itch{/g}. This effect stacks up to 3 times and lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Quand la créature meurt, ses cloques éclatent en aspergeant de sang les ennemis proches, qui reçoivent +1 cumul de {g|f:3bfd44baa24c4533b370dd1373a50e46}Démangeaison insupportable{/g}. Cet effet est cumulable 3 fois et persiste pendant 3 rounds.

languages.text: この生物が死ぬと、その水ぶくれが破裂し、隣接する敵に血を撒き散らす。効果を受けた敵は、+1スタックの{g|f:3bfd44baa24c4533b370dd1373a50e46}耐えがたいかゆみ{/g}を受ける。この効果は3回までスタックし、3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間継続する。
languages.original_text: When this creature dies, its blisters pop, splattering blood on adjacent enemies. The affected enemies suffer +1 stack of {g|f:3bfd44baa24c4533b370dd1373a50e46}Unbearable Itch{/g}. This effect stacks up to 3 times and lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物が死ぬと、その水ぶくれが破裂し、隣接する敵に血を撒き散らす。効果を受けた敵は、+1スタックの{g|f:3bfd44baa24c4533b370dd1373a50e46}耐えがたいかゆみ{/g}を受ける。この効果は3回までスタックし、3ラウンドの間継続する。
この生物が死ぬと、その水ぶくれが破裂し、隣接する敵に血を撒き散らす。効果を受けた敵は、+1スタックの{g|f:3bfd44baa24c4533b370dd1373a50e46}耐えがたいかゆみ{/g}を受ける。この効果は3回までスタックし、3ラウンドの間継続する。

languages.text: Wenn diese Kreatur stirbt, platzen ihre Blasen auf und spritzen Blut auf Gegner auf angrenzenden Feldern. Die betroffenen Gegner werden mit +1 Stapel {g|f:3bfd44baa24c4533b370dd1373a50e46}Unerträgliches Jucken{/g} belegt. Dieser Effekt ist bis zu 3-mal stapelbar und dauert 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang an.
languages.original_text: When this creature dies, its blisters pop, splattering blood on adjacent enemies. The affected enemies suffer +1 stack of {g|f:3bfd44baa24c4533b370dd1373a50e46}Unbearable Itch{/g}. This effect stacks up to 3 times and lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn diese Kreatur stirbt, platzen ihre Blasen auf und spritzen Blut auf Gegner auf angrenzenden Feldern. Die betroffenen Gegner werden mit +1 Stapel {g|f:3bfd44baa24c4533b370dd1373a50e46}Unerträgliches Jucken{/g} belegt. Dieser Effekt ist bis zu 3-mal stapelbar und dauert 3 Runden lang an.
